title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.10 - Eligible uses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.10 - Eligible uses

State Regulations
(a) Program
funds for general development financing may be used for: (1)
new construction, renovation or leasehold
improvements; (2)
the acquisition
or leasing of land, buildings, machinery and equipment; (3)
soft costs related to any of the above
uses; (4)
working capital; and
(5)
feasibility or planning
studies. (b) Program
funds for general development financing may not be used for any ineligible
costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
